subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The police are investigating an incident at Homestead-Miami Speedway involving the Nascar driver Kasey Kahne and a security guard. A spokesman for Kahne said he was rushing to his motor home when he was stopped by the guard, who refused to let him through an entrance to a secure lot without a credential. Kahne, still in his driving uniform, tried to walk past the guard and, according to the spokesman, the two bumped. When Kahne turned around, the guard was on the ground. The police were called and Kahne spent several minutes in handcuffs before being released.
